FULFILLMENT_DESCRIPTION: Order fulfillment is a complex of operations from the moment of placing the order by the buyer and until the moment he receives the purchase. The term is used without translation. As a business service, fulfillment is most in demand by online stores and is often outsourced to fulfillment centers.
NO_NEED_FOR_WAREHOUSE_AND_OFFICE: No need for warehouse and office
TEN_EMAILS: Ten emails and reviews from satisfied customers
WHY_NAILS: Why does an ingrown toenail appear?
WHY_NAILS_INFO: Transverse flat feet, curvature of the toes, improper nail treatment with cutting out corners during manicure, congenital deformity of the feet, wide toes, foot hyperhidrosis, psoriasis, fungal lesions, nail dysplasia, crossing of fingers; heavy loads, heavy weight, frostbite, injuries; narrow, high-heeled, non-ventilated shoes; hereditary factor; cardiovascular diseases, diabetes mellitus, varicose veins; exposure to aggressive chemical substances.

OUR_FULFILLMENT_SERVICE: Our fulfillment service will free up your time and resources to scale your business
WELCOME_TO_YERMESGROUP: Welcome to Yermesgroup, where we specialize in order fulfillment and e-commerce logistics solutions for businesses around the world.
OUR_FRIENDLY_TEAM: Our friendly and efficient team offers much more than just fulfilling your orders. We work in partnership with each of our clients, creating for them the right logistics solutions that help them develop their online sales abroad and in the CIS countries. By carefully understanding and addressing the needs of our customers, we have helped many in their growth from initially shipping several hundred orders per month to thousands of shipments worldwide each month.
WE_HARD_WORK:
We work hard to meet and exceed our customers' expectations while taking on the complexity of logistics.

DIRECTOR: Director of the branch network in the Republic of Kazakhstan
COMMENT_CONTENT:
"I needed a warehouse for storage, packing the parcels and delivery to the client's warehouse. It turned out that this is a Stone Age in Kazakhstan. Parcels are of different types and they cannot be stored in any conditions. I tried different warehouses a couple of times, then I had to give all the goods as defective and compensate for the damage.

Yermesgroup found it on the Internet through Google search. I liked that the company is young and promised to automate the processes. I was fed up with the paperwork, to put it mildly, I still wanted a modern approach. the storage offered by Yermesgroup suited me, the temperature regime, thank God, is respected. The boxes do not crumple. The deliveries were made on the agreed dates and times, the CRM system is fine-tuned. Now I only store the parcels with them, but I think a new batch in November is also through them. No complaints. I recommend.
